name: PRE_AR_ANES_TIMES
description:
This table stores the anesthesia start and end times for each line in a temporary transaction (TAR) record.





*Note: TAR records in Chronicles are purged periodically depending on your system setting. Be aware that old data in this table may be lost if you truncate the table.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the temporary transactionï¿½record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: CE_ANES_START_DTTM
columns.description: The start date and time of the anesthesia procedure.

columns.name: CE_ANES_END_DTTM
columns.description: The end date and time of the anesthesia procedure.
